Reference¶

Base SDK module to get the resources.

class delairstack.sdk.DelairStackSDK(config_path=None, *, resources_config_path=None)¶

Class providing a single resource accessor to get the resource manager objects.

close()¶

Close connections stream if any

resources(resource_name: str)¶

Get a resource manager corresponding to the name.

Parameters:resource_name – the name of the project manager to instantiate:’projects’|’annotations’|’deliverables’|’dxobjects’|’missions’

Returns: ResourceManagerBase

Module in charge of handling CRUD actions of a Resource.

class delairstack.core.resources.resources_manager_base.ResourcesManagerBase(*, provider: delairstack.apis.provider.Provider, **kwargs)¶

This class implements CRUD for any Resource.

create(**kwargs)¶

Create an object.

Parameters:**kwargs –

Returns: Resource

delete(*, resource: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource)¶

Delete the resource.

Parameters:resource – the resource to delete

Returns: True

get(*, id: str)¶

Get an object by its id.

Parameters:id – the id

Returns: Resource

search(*, query)¶

Search objects matching with the query defining the criteria.

Parameters:query – criteria to search the object

Returns: [Resource]

update(*, resource: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource)¶

Update the resource.

Parameters:resource – the resource to update

Returns: Resource

Module dedicated to the annotation resource management

class delairstack.apis.client.projectmngt.annotationsimpl.AnnotationsImpl(project_manager_api, **kwargs)¶

This class represents an accessor to handle annotation objects and actions

create(project: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource, geojson: dict, photo: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource = None, target: str = '2d', properties: dict = None)¶

Create an Annotation object.

Parameters:
  • project (Resource) – the project used to associate the annotation
  • geojson (dict) –

    the geojson defining the features

    Examples:

    json_polygon = {
    ‘type’: ‘Feature’, ‘geometry’: {
    ’type’: ‘Polygon’, ‘coordinates’: [
    [
    [xmin, ymax], [xmax, ymax], [xmax, ymin], [xmin, ymin], [xmin, ymax]

    ]

    ]

    }, ‘properties’: {

    ’name’: ‘My Polygon’, ‘comment’: ‘Test a polygon annotation’

    }

    }

    geojson_point = {
    “type”: “Feature”, “geometry”: {
    ”type”: “Point”, “coordinates”: [
    x, y

    ]

    }, “properties”: {

    ”name”: “My Point”, “comment”: “Test a point annotation”

    }

    }

    geojson_linestring = {
    “type”: “Feature”, “geometry”: {
    ”type”: “LineString”, “coordinates”: [
    [
    x1, y1

    ], [

    x2, y2

    ], [

    x3, y3

    ]

    ]

    }, “properties”: {

    ”name”: “My Linestring”, “comment”: “Test a point annotation”

    }

    }

  • photo (Resource) – the photo
  • target (str) – target of the annotation: ‘2d’ | ‘3d’
  • properties (dict) –

    extra feature properties

    {
    ‘color’ : [R,G,B]

    }
Returns:

the annotation
Return type:

Resource
search(*, project: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource, **kwargs)¶

Get all annotations corresponding to a specific project.

Parameters:project (Resource) – the project
Returns:A list of annotations matching with the search criteria
Return type:[Resource]
update(*, resource: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource)¶

Update the object.

Parameters:resource (Resource) – the annotation to update
Returns:the annotation
Return type:Resource

Module dedicated to the deliverable resource management

class delairstack.apis.client.projectmngt.deliverablesimpl.DeliverablesImpl(project_manager_api: delairstack.apis.provider.ProjectManagerAPI, data_store_api: delairstack.apis.provider.DataStoreAPI, **kwargs)¶

This class represents an accessor to handle deliverable objects and actions

create(*, mission: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource = None, project: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource, name: str, product_type: delairstack.core.resources.products.ProductDefinition)¶

Create a Deliverable which will be associated to the project.

Parameters:
  • mission (Resource) – the associated mission, optional
  • project (Resource) – the associated project
  • name (str) – the name of the deliverable
  • product_type (ProductDefinition) – the product type
Returns:

the object representing a deliverable
Return type:

Resource
search(**kwargs)¶

Search objects matching with the query defining the criteria.

Parameters:query – criteria to search the object

Returns: [Resource]

upload(*, deliverable: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource, files: [<class 'str'>])¶

Upload list of files into a deliverable.

Parameters:
  • deliverable (Resource) – the deliverable
  • [str] (files) – the list of files to upload. It must contains either a list of relative or/and absolute path

Module dedicated to the dxobject resource management.

class delairstack.apis.client.projectmngt.dxobjectsimpl.DXObjectsImpl(project_manager_api: delairstack.apis.provider.ProjectManagerAPI, data_store_api: delairstack.apis.provider.DataStoreAPI, **kwargs)¶

This class represents an accessor to handle dxobject objects and actions.

create(**kwargs)¶

Create an object.

Parameters:**kwargs –

Returns: Resource

download(*, dxobject: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource, destination_directory_path: str)¶

Download a file attached to the dxobject resource. The final destination name will be as <destination_directory_path>/<name>

Parameters:
  • dxobject (Resource) – the DXObject
  • destination_directory_path (str) – the destination directory
get(*, deliverable: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource = None, id: str = None)¶

Read a resource. If a deliverable object is passed as argument, this will return the dxobject contained into it. Otherwise will get object given its id.

Parameters:
  • id (str) – id of the dxobject to search
  • deliverable (Resource) – the deliverable holding a DXObject
Returns:

an dxobject
Return type:

Resource
Raises:

ArgumentOperationError – if the deliverable resource and the id are None
search(**kwargs)¶

Search objects matching with the query defining the criteria.

Parameters:query – criteria to search the object

Returns: [Resource]

update(*, resource: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource)¶

Update the dxobject.

Parameters:resource (Resource) – the dxobject
Returns:a new DXObject
Return type:Resource
upload(*, dxobject: delairstack.core.resources.resource.Resource = None, file_src_path: str = None)¶

Add a file to the DXObject and upload the file to the server.

Parameters:
  • dxobject (Resource) – the DXObject
  • file_src_path (str) – the file source path to upload and to associate

Parameters:name (str) – the project name / mission name
